description: Triangle T read by rows: T(n, m), for n >= 2, and m = 1, 2, ..., n-1, equals the square root of the positive integer solution y of y^2 = x^3 - A(n, m)^2*x with the area A(n, m) = A249869(n, m) of the primitive Pythagorean triangle characterized by (n, m) or 0 if no such triangle exists.
